texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["This information can help you improve health and safety on site. London Underground's health, safety and environment (HSE) Learning Points documents are designed to capture and share key learning points to improve industry HSE performance."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
These Learning Points may have arisen through incidents, accidents, or an event that went particularly well - or not so well.

If you would like to share learning from your own organisation, and believe the industry would benefit, please complete the HSE learning points template (see below) and email the finished document to us .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Recognising good practice: The London Underground (LU) Beacon scheme"}
LU recognises suppliers who demonstrate good practice in site management through its Beacon award scheme. More information on how to become a Beacon supplier can be found below.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Lessons learned template","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/hse-learning-points-template.doc","icon":"download","size":"DOC 40KB","image":{}},{"title":"Protection of valuable assets","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/lessons-learned-prorection-of-vulnerable-assets.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 182KB","image":{}},{"title":"Potential fire in drying room","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/hse-learning-points-vinci-potential-fire.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 36KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
To promote good HSE practice, a library of innovations, products or systems that have been applied by LU or its suppliers to solve a HSE problem.
If you would like to share good practice from your own organisation and believe the industry would benefit please complete the HSE good practice template and email it to us .
